title: Retirement Advisor: Count What Others Are Discounting
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Investors have lost their fear of inflation, a natural consequence of a decade of disinflation. But, this podcast (18:03) argues that advisors must protect clients during retirements that might last 30 years, which even low inflation will not leave unscathed. Moreover, there are reasons to prepare for high inflation, including high government debt whose eventual monetization could trigger hyperinflation. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Investors have lost their fear of inflation, a natural consequence of a decade of disinflation. But, this podcast (18:03) argues that advisors must protect clients during retirements that might last 30 years, which even low inflation will not leave unscathed. Moreover, there are reasons to prepare for high inflation, including high government debt whose eventual monetization could trigger hyperinflation.
